member.name: T:Cake.Issues.PullRequests.GitHubActions.GitHubActionsBuildsAliases

member.name: M:Cake.Issues.PullRequests.GitHubActions.GitHubActionsBuildsAliases.GitHubActionsBuilds(Cake.Core.ICakeContext)

member.returns: Object for writing issues to GitHub Actions.

example.para: Report code analysis issues reported as MsBuild warnings to GitHub Actions:

member.name: P:Cake.Issues.PullRequests.GitHubActions.GitHubActionsBuildSettings.GroupIssues
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether issues should be grouped by issue provider and run information. Enabled by default.

member.name: T:Cake.Issues.PullRequests.GitHubActions.GitHubActionsPullRequestSystem
member.summary: Class for posting issues to GitHub Actions.

member.param: Settings for writing the issues to GitHub Actions.

member.name: M:Cake.Issues.PullRequests.GitHubActions.GitHubActionsPullRequestSystem.FormatWarningOptions(Cake.Core.IO.DirectoryPath,Cake.Core.IO.FilePath,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Formats the options for the warning service message.
member.param: The root path of the file, relative to the repository root.
The file path relative to the project root.
The line where the issue ocurred.
The column where the issue ocurred.
